name: v0.4.0-rc.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "gazelle_cc", version = "0.4.0-rc.3")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "gazelle_cc",
    sha256 = "19ade3940a6d422edc16d39c44952d5992fb9b50c55d88ef5cc65eb0fdb95cb1",
    strip_prefix = "gazelle_cc-0.4.0-rc.3",
    url = "https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/releases/download/v0.4.0-rc.3/gazelle_cc-v0.4.0-rc.3.tar.gz",
)
load("@gazelle_cc//:deps.bzl", "gazelle_cc_dependencies")
gazelle_cc_dependencies()
```

See https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc#installation for full setup instructions.

name: v0.3.0-rc.1
body:
## What's Changed
* release: update publish-to-bcr and set bot authoring by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/126
* CI: upgrade deps, bazel 9 compatibility, test platforms by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/129
* release: use specific hash for publish-to-bcr by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/130


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0-rc.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "gazelle_cc", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "gazelle_cc",
    sha256 = "8e990e454b06c529e383239e0692a1f17b003e3e7a5a0f967ee5f6aeb400105a",
    strip_prefix = "gazelle_cc-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/engflow/gazelle_cc/releases/download/v0.1.0/gazelle_cc-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/engflow/gazelle_cc#installation for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Bootstrap the inititial gazelle C++ extension by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/1
* Upgrade to rules_go 0.52.0, Go 1.24.0, Bazel 8.1.0 by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/8
* Allow to split cc_library sources based on headers and its dependencies  by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/7
* Implement `language.Loads()` by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/11
* Make rules generation context (previous definitions) aware. by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/10
* Enusre gazelle:map_kind is handled correctly by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/21
* Add copyright header to all Go source files.  by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/28
* Ensure relative include paths are resolved as expected by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/22
* Relativize resolved `deps` whenever possible by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/23
* Ensure that source grouping and dependency resolution is aware of workspace-relative path to file by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/27
* Directive `gazelle:cc_group unit` now does also split test sources. by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/33
* Initial support for protobuf by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/35
* Add readme with setup instructions by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/36
* Replace "cpp" and "c++" with "cc" almost everywhere by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/37
* all: update copyright header by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/40
* Add external dependency resolving based on 'bazel_dep' and headers index created from BCR by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/32
* Remove bazel build directory symlink by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/48
* Fix and improve indexing bzlmod cc_rules by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/52
* docs: Add CONTRIBUTING.md by @jayconrod in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/54
* [CI] Prepare release workflows by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/53
* [CI] Add secrets input for publish-to-bcr workflow by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @WojciechMazur made their first contribution in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/1
* @jayconrod made their first contribution in https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/pull/8

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/EngFlow/gazelle_cc/commits/v0.1.0
